ygData.subject: Re: Magical weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, From Freeport im not sure, because im from Queynos. As far as levels in Runnyeye, they range from level 5 all the way up to the king who is around 35. At
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,

From Freeport im not sure, because im from Queynos. As far as levels in
Runnyeye, they range from level 5 all the way up to the king who is around
35. At 11 you could probbaly take the elite guard who hold some good loot.
Runnyeye is also attached to a George which has Muddites, Minotaurs, and
other high lev goblins. Its a great place for exp and thos aweful fun Mino
Axes!

Dycedarg

> -----Original Message-----
> From: McConnell, Jeff [SMTP:Jeff.McConnell@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 8:38 AM
> To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqpaladin] Re: Magical weapons
>
> From: "McConnell, Jeff" <Jeff.McConnell@...>
>
> Hail
> I was wondering what lvl exp they are? I am currently lvl 11 is that
> too high for that place. Also I am currently stationed in Felwithe and I
> know my way to Freeport but if I could get directions from there it would
> be
> most appreciated
>
> Silvermyst
>
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Chris Ferriera [SMTP:cferriera@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 8:25 AM
> > To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
> > Subject: [eqpaladin] Re: Magical weapons
> >
> > From: Chris Ferriera <cferriera@...>
> >
> > Hi,
> >
> > If you want to be the Donald Trump of all the Paladins, head over
> to
> > Rivervale. The Goblins of runnyeye wear ringmail and have weapons, all
> > that
> > sell for a good profit. I pull in about 6 PP a night for 3 hours worth
> of
> > slaughter of the greenskins!
> >
> > Dycedarg
> > Knight of Thunder
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Ryan [SMTP:rwp3@...]
> > > Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 2:03 PM
> > > To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
> > > Subject: [eqpaladin] Magical weapons
> > >
> > > From: Ryan <rwp3@...>
> > >
> > >
> > > I was just wondering if anyone knew of a place I might find a magical
> > > weapon of some sort. Nothing really powerfull, I'm only 10th lvl right
> > > now, I just need something that will do damage to iceboned skeletons
> and
> > > ghouls. Also, I seem to be making money very slowly. The only trade
> > skills
> > > I have are cooking and a little blacksmithing. Is there a good zone to
> > > make money in? The most money I have ever had at one time is 8 pp! Is
> > this
> > > normal or am I going about things all wrong?
> > >
> > >
> > > Thank you for your assistance my friends,
> > > Sir Reppik, Paladin of the 10th order
> > > Freeport, Bertoxxulous
> > >
> > >
> > >
